TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProjectElement extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Abstract base class for MSBuild construction object model elements.

All parent elements of this element, going up to the ProjectRootElement.
None if this is a ProjectRootElement.
None if this has not been attached to a parent yet.
Docs.value: Returns an enumerator over all parent elements. There are no parents elements if the project element is a ProjectRootElement or if this is not yet attached to a parent element.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Condition { get; set; }

Docs.summary:
Gets or sets the Condition value.
It will return empty string IFF a condition attribute is legal but itâ€™s not present or has no value.
It will return null IFF a Condition attribute is illegal on that element.
Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.
It is possible for derived classes to throw an if setting the condition is not applicable for those elements.
Docs.value: Returns the Condition attribute value. Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Removes the Condition attribute if the value to set is set to null or an empty string. If the Condition attribute is not present, returns an empty string instead of throwing an exception because a nonexistent condition is implicitly true
For the "ProjectExtensions" element, the getter returns null and the setter throws an exception for any value.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary:
ProjectRootElement (possibly imported) that contains this Xml.
Cannot be null.
Docs.value: Returns the project root container that contains this project.

Docs.summary:
Gets or sets the Label value.
Returns empty string if it is not present.
Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.
Docs.value: Returns the label. Returns an empty string if no label is present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Removes the attribute if the value to set is empty.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary:
Next sibling element.
May be null.
Docs.value: Returns the next sibling of this project element. Returns null if no next sibling exists.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary:
Null if this is a ProjectRootElement.
Null if this has not been attached to a parent yet.
Docs.value: Returns the project element container that contains this project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Parent should only be set by ProjectElementContainer.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary:
Previous sibling element.
May be null.
Docs.value: Returns the previous sibling of this project element. Returns null if no previous sibling exists.
